Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: bobtown55
Reviews.Content: Overall nice and convenient environment. Hotel rooms a nice, but overall not very quiet. Food in the restaurants are on an lower level, but acceptable.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden treasure”
Reviews.Author: Stefanojay
Reviews.Content: If you traveling with your family this is the place to stay in Singapore. The rooms are huge, with a nice balcony with view on the golf course. It's very relaxing, immerse in a lush garden, with 3 good restaurants, a real and big supermarket open till 10 p.m., 3 fantastic swimming pools, one of them is olympic size. There is even a bowling alley, a very nice playground and even a kindergarden where you can drop your kid. It's very close to the zoo and 20 min. to Orchard street with MRT. I can't wait to return to Singapore to stay again in that beautiful resort.

Reviews.Title: “Good for relaxing”
Reviews.Author: chenyu11
Reviews.Content: Stayed a night on 31/12/11 with family. Reasonable price of $200 for a Queen bed + Single bed, beautiful view from room balcony. Good water pressure. There is a NTUC supermarket in the country club, very convenience. Have free shuttle bus from and to Yishun MRT. The drawback is can hear the voice outside the room when stay in the room, a bit annoyed.

Reviews.Title: “A Relaxing place to stay”
Reviews.Author: W L
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel because it's the nearest hotel from my auntie home. It's out of my expectation that the room is spacious and price are very reasonable among singapore hotels. The view from the room is good. Very silent and secure. I would definitely come back if I go to singapore again. One of the drawback is wifi is a payment service. I didn't spend any time on hotel area or hotel facilities. Hope next time can enjoy~

Reviews.Title: “Stunning Resort free from the bustle”
Reviews.Author: Thaitimes
Reviews.Content: The Orchid Country Club is a $16 cab ride from the heart of Singapore and quite close to the zoo. It has beautiful recreational facilities including a world class 36 hole golf course, driving range, an olympic swimming pool and a resort and children's pool, a bowling alley, restaurants and a beautifully equipped gym and squash courts. The rooms are the largest you will find anywhere and are furnished beautifully. The only downside of this hotel are the breakfasts are third rate and internet access is around $10 per day depending on the length of your stay. That said, I would not stay anywhere else in Singapore if I wanted a resort experience that is 20 minutes from the heart of the action.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for relaxation”
Reviews.Author: ColinChristchurch
Reviews.Content: Quiet, relaxing, 3 pools, grocery shop, 10 pin bowls, gym, couple of bars, golf, a great place to stay, the room was large and comfortable, great views and well priced. Will stay again

Reviews.Title: “Spacious rooms”
Reviews.Author: Jameskee
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 2 nights at this hotel. As what the previous chap had commented - there is nothing much to do here if you are not a golfer. There is a bowling alley in the hotel itself though. What we liked - 1. Rooms are amazing spacious 2. Great view of the golf course 3. Relaxing getaway What we didn't like - 1. The breakfast is poor by Singapore standards as a food paradise 2. No sheltered carparks, my car became a sauna and target practice for pigeons after a day's parking 3. Nothing to do there! 4. No internet in the rooms (or in the hotel at all)

Reviews.Title: “Nothing to do around ...”
Reviews.Author: ThierryIT
Reviews.Content: Hello, Can be a good hotel for very short / business trip, but not for holidays .... We stay there 3 night, late check in, after a very long flight, we have to stay in the lobby for 4 hours before getting our room, who was ready for a very long time. Beautiful golf course, for people who play golf ... But as "external client" we don't have the right to walk around to the reservoir ... So what to do ?? Nothing ... If you want to go to the town center, you will have first to take the shuttle to the MRT ... Swimming pool are very good, there is one of 50 meters ... There is no very nice restaurant around, one chinese, but I was sick during the night, and the main hotel restaurant who is horrible. The bedroom was very nice.
